articles.author: Singh Rahul Sunilkumar
articles.title: How phone's light affects sleep? Astronaut to explore the science in ISS - Hindustan Times
articles.description: European Space Agency astronaut Andreas Mogensen is conducting sleep-related experiments on the International Space Station.
articles.content: Have you ever been told to avoid looking at your phone before bedtime? That's because the blue light emitted by screens can disrupt your Circadian rhythm, your body's natural response to daylight cha… [+2345 chars]
